channel.title: Heap Space error?
channel.description:
When i boot up my server, after its on for a while and people start logging in, it appears with this error:
Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
it blocks everyone from logging in, even though the server isnt down. When i first started running the server i didnt do this, this is the 3rd day it has been up...
are there any solutions to my problem? :\
( btw i use hamachi )

item.title: Heap Space error?
item.dc:creator: @ipkyouhaha ipkyouhaha
item.description:
@ipkyouhaha wrote:

this is what my run.bat looks like:

@echo off
COLOR 08
title zezimascape.servegame.com Server
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_07injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_07in/java.exe” server

pause

is there something wrong with it? what should it look like after you add the “java -Xms190m -Xmx1000m server”?
[br][size=1]Posted at: August 07, 2006, 08:07:48 PM[/size][hr]anyone?

Read full topic

item.title: Heap Space error?
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

[QUOTE = Budda]Muahahahahaha I have the fix for this…

In your run.bat, change

java server

to

java -Xms190m -Xmx1000m server

Enjoy [/QUOTE]

Wht the hell don’t you understand about that? It’s simple!

Read full topic

item.title: Heap Space error?
item.dc:creator: @Wolfeyes217 Wolfeyes217
item.description:
@Wolfeyes217 wrote:

[quote=“KsMuffin, post:4, topic:5729”]hm…i added the code and ran my serve,r it ran ok but im not ALL the way for sure that it wont come in like 5 minutes.

that was my whole problem, the error would come, in like 10 minutes of playtime

whne i reboot my comp and run server, we can find out :D[/quote]
Let me guess your using testscape?

This happen to me, the ONLY way I fixed it was I had to download cheezscape and change all my coding over

Read full topic
